Title: Mr Perfect
Writer: Dasaradh (story), Kishore Gopu, Bobby Kolli (screenwriter), Abburi Ravi (dialogues), Prasad Rishi
Actors: Prabhas, Kajal Aggarwal, Tapsee Pannu, Raghu Babu
Plot: Vicky (Prabhas), an expert in gaming software, lives in Australia and never compromises in his life, a principle he adheres to since his childhood. He believes that one should be oneself in...
